description: Main front-end route for the notes application built with Qwik, managing notes list, selection, editing, and rendering components related to notes.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Loads notes from the NotesService, either all or filtered by the search term.

methods.name: selectNote
methods.description: Selects a note by its ID and resets editing/creating states.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID after user confirmation and updates the notes list.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Updates the search term and reloads notes accordingly.

methods.name: selectedNote
methods.description: Computes and returns the currently selected note object.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles saving a new or edited note via the NotesService, then reloads the notes list.
